short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little game to find the impostor emoji and keep you busy when a bit bored.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You choose two emoji ( one impostor & the rest are clone ) , then it generate a grid of 10x10

Your objectif find the fastest the impostor among all of them
